Name: Manual_WorldofWarcraftDungeons_Chakraa
description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

2.0.description:
This AP was left to die (kind of) as it hasn't been updated since The War Within released and changes to the game were made

So, I took the time to fully revamp the core of this AP, while keeping the aspect it was meant to do in the first place.

- Added: You can now play this AP as a non-free to play user, meaning you can queue for all Pre-TWW dungeons (at this time) if you set your YAML option to "All".
  - The "Free to Play" mode, which allows access to all dungeons at level 20 or under, is still available, making it easier to make a character and hop in the AP as soon as possible.
- Added: You can now select which expansion to randomly select dungeons from as a YAML option.
- Added: You can now select how many dungeons you have total in the pool as a YAML option.
- Added: You can now select how many items each completed dungeons will send as a YAML option.
- Added: You can now select how many Gold Coins (your goal) there are to find in the pool as a YAML option.
- Changed: You will start with an amount of Gold Coins equal to 100 minus the amount you wish to find, so the goal is always to find "100 Gold Coins". This helps the AP work a bit better in terms of logic.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ChakraaThePanda/Archipelago-Manual-WorldofWarcraft-Dungeons/compare/1.0...2.0
2.0.title: 2.0 - Full Revamp of the AP

2025.02.10.description:
- Fixed: Issue where the final dungeons list became too small because of disabled expansions in the YAML
- Fixed: Some text in the generated YAML to specify how many dungeons are included in the Free to Play or All modes
2025.02.10.title: 2025.02.10 - Fix if Category is Disabled

2025.02.13.description: - Fixed a small non-major issue that now uses the proper world.random instead to help make seed reproductible. Thanks @Eijebong
2025.02.13.title: 2025.02.13 - Minor Fix - World Random Fix

2025.02.14.description:
- Small changes to add a bit of flavor to the filler items and McGuffins
- Gold Coins are now Apexis Crystals
- Added a bunch of filler items that are some small WoW memes
  - If you have any suggestions or what to add / remove for those meme items, let me know!
2025.02.14.title: 2025.02.14 - Flavor Up!

2025.04.06.description:
- Removed the flavor filler items, it polluted the item received list way too much

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ChakraaThePanda/Archipelago-Manual-WorldofWarcraft-Dungeons/compare/2025.02.14...2025.04.06
2025.04.06.title: 2025.04.06 - Revert Flavor

2025.09.01.description:
* UPDATED: Leading Zeros in front of single digit Location/Item names to have a better ordering in the tracker
